aboutOne.title: Know About Gined
aboutOne.subTitle: Learning Platform
aboutOne.desc: GinEd is a platform that acts as a friend, tutor, and mentor to guide students towards choosing the right path in their careers. GinEd believes that the root cause of a candidate’s success lies in understanding what they want to do when they finish their basic education. By offering guidance on college selection, career options, and mentorship, GinEd helps students gain expertise and hands-on experience while pursuing their studies through multiple skilled courses and internships with different companies.

children.title: Gined for Students
children.info: Students can rely on  Gined for all their college-related needs, from researching dream colleges, internship, Placements, Tours to simplifying the admission process. With a vast database of 5000+ colleges and  2000+ courses categorized by streams like Management, Engineering, Medical, Arts, and more.

children.title: Gined for Parents
children.info: The website caters to parents seeking ideal institutes for their children. It features a multichannel filter page organizing data by ranking, fees, and cutoff.

children.title: 0% Education Loan
children.info: The Education Loan with 0% EMI option is open to students who have successfully completed their Class 12 Board Exam and have applied for undergraduate and/or postgraduate admissions via Gined.

aboutTwo.title: Know About Gined
aboutTwo.subTitle: Learning Platform
aboutTwo.desc: GinEd is a platform that acts as a friend, tutor, and mentor to guide students towards choosing the right path in their careers. GinEd believes that the root cause of a candidate’s success lies in understanding what they want to do when they finish their basic education. By offering guidance on college selection, career options, and mentorship, GinEd helps students gain expertise and hands-on experience while pursuing their studies through multiple skilled courses and internships with different companies.

children.title: Skilled Professionals
children.info: GinEd has a team of skilled professionals who are experts in their respective fields, providing candidates with the necessary guidance and support.

children.title: Personalised Support
children.info: GinEd provides personalized support to candidates, guiding them every step of the way to make informed decisions about their academic and career goals.
